name: Code Heroes
description:
Game Introduction:
The brand-new idle card "Code Hero" is a "classic code art style" mobile game, which allows you to relive the classic style, to build the strongest hero army. The high-strategic lineup and diversified fetters make the battle change rapidly.

Background Story:
On a wonderful weekend, you're surfing the Internet but suddenly your computer is controlled by someone, telling you that you've been chosen to save the world. You're about to attack him at 240 characters per minute, but you can't control the computer now. Moreover, you feel your body is slowly changing, and you seem to have entered his world, a world composed of codes.

Features Introduction:
Code style, new idle card game
strategy combat, combine heroes as you like
Leisure cultivates, offline also benefits
Cross-server hegemony, brand new competitive duel
Non-loss card replacement, cultivate heroes causally
